description: TYPO3 Legacy Source Installation - Extensions should be found in typo3conf/ext directory

legacy_news.reason: Should find legacy_news in typo3conf/ext directory

legacy_powermail.reason: Should find legacy_powermail in typo3conf/ext directory

notes: For legacy installations, extensions MUST only be in typo3conf/ext directory
